gurmukhi: idv dyKh gy ]jX lyKh gy ]Dn BwKh gy ]icq rwKh gy ]339]
transliteration: Div Dekhah Ge|| Jaya Likhah Ge|| Dhan Bhaakhah Ge|| Chit Raakhah Ge||339||
translation: The gods will see and hail: they will utter “Bravo, Bravo” and will be pleased in their mind.339.

gurmukhi: jX kwrx hYN ]Air hwrx hYN ]Kl KMfn hYN ]mih mMfn hYN ]340]
transliteration: Jaya Kaaran Hain|| Ar(i) Haaran Hain|| Khal Khanndan Hain|| Maih Mandan Hain||340||
translation: The Lord is the cause of all victories and the remover of the enemies; He is the destroyer of the tyrants and is Full of Glory.340.

gurmukhi: Ar dUKn hYN ]Bv BUKn hYN ]mih mMfnu hYN ]Ar fMfnu hYN ]341]
transliteration: Ar Dookhan Hain|| Bhav Bhaakhanndhain|| Maih Mandan(u) Hain|| Ar Dandan(u) Hain||341||
translation: He is the giver of suffering to the tyrants and is the ornamentation of the world; the praiseworthy Lord is the punisher of the enemies.341.

gurmukhi: dl gwhn hYN ]As bwhn hYN ]jg kwrn hYN AX Dwrn hYN ]342]
transliteration: Dal Gadhan Hain|| As Baahan Hain|| Jag Kaaran Hain|| Aya Dhaaram Hain||342||
translation: He is the destroyer of the armies and is the striker of the sword; He is the creator of the world and also its supporter.342.

gurmukhi: mn mohn hYN ]suB sohn hYN ]Air qwpn hY ]jg jwpn hYN ]
transliteration: Man Mohan Hain|| Soubh Sohan Hain|| Ar(i) Taapan Hain|| Jag Jaapan Hain||343||
translation: He is Bewitching and Glorious; He is the Affliction-Giver for the enemies and the world remembers Him.343.

gurmukhi: pRx pUrx hYN ]Ar cUrx hYN ]sr brKn hYN ]Dn krKn hYN ]344]
transliteration: Pran Pooran Hain|| Ar Chootan Hain|| Sar Barkhan Hain|| Dhan Karkhan Hain||344||
translation: He is the masher of the enemy and fulfiller of the promise; He showers the arrows with His bow.344.

gurmukhi: qIA mohn hYN ]Cb sohn hYN ]mn Bwvn hYN ]Gn swvn hYN ]345]
transliteration: Teea Mohan Hain|| Chhah Sohan Hain|| Man Bhaavan Hain|| Ghan Saavan Hain||345||
translation: He is the Fascinator of women, Glorious and elegant; He allures the mind like the clouds of Sawan.345.

gurmukhi: Bv BUKn hYN ]piRq pUKn hYN ]sis Awnn hYN ]sm Bwnn hYN ]346]
transliteration: Bhav Bhookhan Hain|| Prit Pnkhan Hain|| Sas(i) Aanan Hain|| Sam Bhaanan Hain||346||
translation: He is the ornament of the world and is the sustainer of tradition; he is cool like the moon and bright-faced like the sun.346.

gurmukhi: Ar Awvn hYN ]suK dwvn hYN ]Gn Gorn hYN ]sm morn hYN ]347]
transliteration: Ar Aavan Hain|| Soukh Daavan Hain|| Ghan Ghoran Hain|| Sam Moran Hain||347||
translation: He comes and gives comfort and happiness; seeing he thick clouds, he gets pleased like the peacock.347.

gurmukhi: jgqysur hYN ]krnwkr hYN ]Bv BUKn hYN ]Ar dUKn hYN ]348]
transliteration: Jagtesur Hain|| Karnaakar Hain|| Bhav Bhookhan Hain|| Ar Dookhan Hain||348||
translation: He is Merciful Lord of the world; He is the ornament of the universe and the remover of suffering.348.

gurmukhi: Cb soBq hYN ]qRIA loBq hYN ]diRg Cwjq hYN ]miRg lwjq hYN ]349]
transliteration: Chhah Sobhat Hain|| Treea Lobhat Hain|| Drig Chhaadat Hain|| Mrig Laajat Hain||349||
translation: He is the allurer of women and most beautiful; seeing his charming eyes, the deer are getting shy.349.

gurmukhi: hrxI piq sy ]nlxI Dr sy ]krunwbuD hYN ]su pRBw Dr hYN ]350]
transliteration: Harnipat(i) Se|| Nalani Dhar Se|| Karounaabudh Hain|| Souprabhaa Dhar Hain||350||
translation: His eyes are like the deer’s eyes and lotus; He is full of Mercy and Glory.350.

gurmukhi: kil kwrx hYN ]Bv auDwrx hYN ]Cb Cwjq hYN ]sur lwjq hYN ]351]
transliteration: Kal(i) Kaaran Hain|| Bhav Udhaaran Hain|| Chhab Chhaadat Hain|| Sur Laajat Hain||351||
translation: He is the cause of the Iron Age and the redeemer of the world; He is Beauty-incarnate and even the gods become shy on seeing Him.351.

gurmukhi: AsXupwsk hYN ]Air nwsk hYN ]Air Gwiek hYN ]suKdwiek hYN ]352]
transliteration: Asyoupaasak Hain|| Ar(i) Naasak Hain|| Ar(i) Ghaaik Hain|| Soukhdaaik Hain||352||
translation: Heis the worshipper of the sword and the Destroyer of the enemy; He is the giver of happiness and killer of the enemy.352.
